title: Luxury Cottages UK
text:
1 vote(s) travel resume 
Looking for somewhere extra-special to stay for your next holiday? A place that stands out from the crowd, the kind you dream of, one that offers a supreme level of comfort and exclusive facilities? Then let dreams come true and lavish your family and friends with a stay in one of our luxury cottage Holidays , each one boasting at least a 4 or 5 star Tourist Board rating, or 4 or 5 ticks with Sykes.We give you a truly relaxing holiday without all the hassle of going abroad. You get a chance to visit some of our most exciting and beautiful destinations with more luxury, comfort, privacy, and elegance than any hotel can offer.Mulberry Cottage is a luxury collection of some of the finest cottages and holiday properties from across the UK. We have chosen only the properties that have reached the highest levels of accommodation and amenities. Swimming Pools, Hot Tubs, 5 Stars, Tennis Courts, everything you would expect with Mulberry Cottage.We are delighted to announce that we offer a fully tested secure Online Booking Service to complement our Booking Office operation. Nearly all our properties allow you to go ahead and make a booking with your credit card at any time that suits you. Alternatively, our Booking Office Staff are on hand to check availability, confirm your booking, and answer any of your queries. They have personal knowledge of every property. You will receive helpful and reliable advice that makes sure that your holiday cottage is the right one for you. Our discerning clients expect a luxurious escape when they book with Unique Home Stays; but as well as indulgence they crave a holiday experience that will linger in the memory when their hard-earned downtime has long passed. It is our passion to match clients with the holiday home of their dreams. ...
